name: Valerie Sorrentino
what_you_do: Valerie Sorrentino is a Life Energy Coach and Energy Mastery Mentor who guides people from disorganized overwhelm and anxiety to living the life they love.
who_you_serve: Valerie serves people who want to tap into the beauty of life and manifest health and happiness.
signature_programs: Valerie offers mind-body practices like yoga, visioning, meditation, and power journaling, as well as space clearing and decluttering services to help people live with greater ease and joy.
business_focus: Valerie helps people align their mind, body, and home energies for clarity and peace.
service_provided: life coaching, energy healing, yoga, meditation, space clearing, decluttering
